subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Five challengers have signed up for the chance to take on the software billionaire Larry Ellison’s Oracle Team USA in the 2017 America’s Cup in a location still to be decided.
snippet: Five challengers have signed up for the chance to take on the software billionaire Larry Ellison’s Oracle Team USA in the 2017 America’s Cup in a location still to be decided.
